appDesc.message: Single click to Add or Edit a bookmark, double click to Manage bookmarks. You can also assign a keyboard shorcut. (ALT+B and ALT+M by default) Extension also shows if the bookmark is already stored

link_login.message: Login to your Google Bookmarks account

conf_shorcuts_add.message: Type your Shorcut to Add a Bookmark

conf_shorcuts_manage.message: Type your Shorcut to launch Bookmarks Manager

conf_shorcuts_info.message: You can use [ ALT, CRTL, SHIFT, META ] as modifiers, any of [ A-Z ] or [ 0-9 ] or any of the

conf_window_usepopup.message: Use a Popup to Add a new bookmark, instead of a new Tab

conf_magic_use_magic.message: When adding a bookmark, automagically locate and fill labels and notes

conf_visual_guide_show.message: Show if the URL is already in your bookmarks

conf_visual_guide_animate.message: Use animations along with the Visual guide icon

conf_save_note.message: Be sure to save your changes after making changes. If you change the keyboard shortcuts, you'll need to reload the open pages for them work, or just restart your browser.

conf_help_single_click.message: A single click will open a popup where you can Add or Edit a bookmark, and it will automatically close on Save

conf_help_double_click.message: A double click on the icon will open a new tab with your Google Bookmarks account, where you will be able to Manage your bookmarks

conf_help_visual_guide_inactive.message: With the Visual guide off, this icon will always be displayed:

conf_help_visual_guide_inactive_star.message: Fixed icon, connected or not, already bookmarked or not

conf_help_visual_guide_active.message: But if you use the visual guide, you will see these icons in your bar:

conf_help_visual_guide_active_disconnect.message: You are not connected to your Google account

conf_help_visual_guide_active_nolabels.message: URL is already in your bookmarks, with no labels set

conf_help_visual_guide_active_2labels.message: URL is already in your bookmarks, with two labels set

conf_help_visual_guide_animations.message: If you also activate animations, the icon will animate to to get your attention when there are changes:

dedicated_why.message: for more reasons than can fit in this footer.
